 Lemma for ~ eroprf .  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
statement:
eropr.1 $e |- J = ( A /. R ) $.
eropr.2 $e |- K = ( B /. S ) $.
eropr.3 $e |- ( ph -> T e. Z ) $.
eropr.4 $e |- ( ph -> R Er U ) $.
eropr.5 $e |- ( ph -> S Er V ) $.
eropr.6 $e |- ( ph -> T Er W ) $.
eropr.7 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ U ) $.
eropr.8 $e |- ( ph -> B C_ V ) $.
eropr.9 $e |- ( ph -> C C_ W ) $.
eropr.10 $e |- ( ph -> .+ : ( A X. B ) --> C ) $.
eropr.11 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( ( r e. A /\ s e. A ) /\ ( t e. B /\ u e. B ) ) ) -> ( ( r R s /\ t S u ) -> ( r .+ t ) T ( s .+ u ) ) ) $.
eroveu $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( X e. J /\ Y e. K ) ) -> E! z E. p e. A E. q e. B ( ( X = [ p ] R /\ Y = [ q ] S ) /\ z = [ ( p .+ q ) ] T ) ) $.
$d .+ p q r s t u z $.
$d A p q r s t u z $.
$d B p q r s t u z $.
$d J p q z $.
$d K p q z $.
$d R p q r s t u z $.
$d S p q r s t u z $.
$d T p q r s t u z $.
$d X p q r s t u z $.
$d Y p q r s t u z $.
$d p ph q r s t u z $.
